message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $10500. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product, and it's the lowest I can go at this time. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $10000. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
